document.full_text: china's highest court has upheld the death sentences of seven people in the far western region of xinjiang who were convicted of murders and robberies aimed at raising money for a terrorist plot.
document.title: asia: china: court upholds death penalty for 7 convicted in xinjiang violence
lines_and_colors: china's highest court has upheld the death sentences of seven people in the far western region of xinjiang who were convicted of murders and robberies aimed at raising money for a terrorist plot.
